subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: The Scopes Trial: Evolution on Trial
description: One-minute skill: The Scopes Trial: Evolution on Trial.

hook.text: In 1925, a teacher was arrested for teaching evolution. The trial became a circus, a movie, and a culture war symbol.

buildup.text: John Scopes taught evolution in Tennessee, violating state law. The ACLU recruited him to challenge the ban.

discovery.text: The trial pitted lawyer Clarence Darrow against politician William Jennings Bryan. It was broadcast nationally on radio.

twist.text: Scopes was convicted but fined only $100. The trial didn't settle anything. America still fights the same battle today.

climax.text: The Scopes trial made evolution a culture war issue. Science and religion became teams to pick, not ideas to explore.

punchline.text: 1925's trial turned evolution into a team sport. America still plays that game.

quiz.question: What was the Scopes Trial about?
options: A teacher arrested for teaching evolution in Tennessee
